text: Reber pri Škofljici () is a small settlement east of Škofljica in central Slovenia. The entire Municipality of Škofljica was traditionally part of the Lower Carniola region and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Škofljica municipal site ==Name== The name of the settlement was changed from Reber to Reber pri Škofljici in 1953.Spremembe naselij 1948–95. 1996. Database. Ljubljana: Geografski inštitut ZRC SAZU, DZS. ==References== ==External links== * *Reber pri Škofljici on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Škofljica
title: Reber pri Škofljici
